RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 42. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BACOPA BAY broke outward bumping LADYBUGGIN into CRYPTONIS CATWALK at the start, sped to the lead, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under mild left handed urging to win as much the best. BUSYBEING FABULOUS pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then was no match while well clear for second. LADYBUGGIN was fractious in the gate, bumped between horses at the start, stumbled and passed a tiring rival late. WELLOILEDCAT failed to menace. CRYPTONIC CATWALK bumped at the start, stalked the pace near the inside into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Bacopa Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, rushed lead, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Ladybuggin
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, bumped between horses start, stumbled,

ENTRY.NAME: Cryptonic Catwalk
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Busybeing Fabulous
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, no match for winner, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Welloiledcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUJARA settled six wide down the backstretch, rallied three wide through the turn, made the lead entering the stretch, shook clear under right handed urging and lasted under strong handling. WORTHERWEIGHTNGOLD had good early speed, dropped back a bit before the turn, lacked racing room behind rivals causing her rider to steady midway on the turn, shifted out the five path and came on again late. QUARANTINA went evenly. INDY PRINCESS KOKO trailed until deep stretch and passed tiring rivals in the six path. WHOVILLE pressed the pace three then two wide for a half and weakened in the stretch. FLOWZANO broke sharply, set a pressured pace along the inside for a half then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Quarantina
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Princess Koko
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals, 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Flowzano
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 1/4 pole, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Wortherweightngold
ENTRY.OWNER: Fairwinds Farm and Shafer, Steve D.
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, no room, steadied mid turn, altered 5path, came again

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6 wide early, rallied 3 wide turn, clear right urging, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Whoville
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 21. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEXATOGA slow early, closed with a rush along the rail through the stretch under left handed urging and was along in time. POWERFUL MOON pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, was carried out to the five path by the leader, made the lead late then finished second best. JOHNNY U away alertly, set pace the pace into the stretch, drifted to the four path near the three sixteenths pole then was outfinished in a game effort. BULLION had a mild rally late in the two path. HEY SACH stalked the pace three wide into the stretch then weakened. BRYCE'S ANGEL well placed, failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Sach
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lexatoga
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, closed with a rush rail, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny U
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, outfinished gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Powerful Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Bullion
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late 2path

ENTRY.NAME: Bryce's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 92. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAT DADDY tracked the leaders along the inside for a half, angled out three wide entering the stretch, split rivals before the furlong marker and won under strong handling. SHADOW TRACER pressed the pace two wide into the turn, made the lead, set the pace until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. THRU THE VINE unhurried early, closed a gap late two wide. LAZARUS PROJECT with the second flight two wide, finished with good courage five wide. BREEZY MONEY set a pressured pace along the inside for nearly a half then was outfinished. AMIGO'S AFFAIR pressed the pace three wide into the stretch then weakened. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Fat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, angled 3 wide top lane, split foes, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Tragically Quewick
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Breezy Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, finished well, 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Tracer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, no match winner

ENTRY.NAME: Amigo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Thru the Vine
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed gap late 2 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12 ,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEET THE BEAUTY broke in front, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under confident handling. ALSANAH trailed early, closed willingly along the inside and finished second best. LEWD pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. FIONA moved up three wide after a half, drew closer to the winner two wide nearing the quarter pole then faded late. PEARLINTHEROUGH stalked the early pace along the inside and lacked the needed response. MAY BEAU offered a mild bid between horses two wide nearing the half mile marker then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: May Beau
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, between horses, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Meet the Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, confident handling

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hurstland Farm, Inc. & James H. Greene Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Pearlintherough
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Alsanah
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Fiona
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, faded late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVINE MARTHA broke in front then gave up a narrow lead before a quarter, prompted the pace into the turn two wide, regained command, widened into the stretch and lasted under strong handling. RADIANTRITHYM never far back, was steadily gaining ground late in the four path. GRAN MAMIBELLA trailed early then passed tiring rivals five wide. LOADED ONCE MORE went evenly in the three path. COURTLY sprinted up the inside to make the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the turn, remained a sharp threat into the stretch and weakened late. MISS OVER THERE vied for the lead two wide and was through after three furlongs. MAGICGIRL had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Courtly
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead inside, set pace turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 2 wide, through after 3furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Magicgirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Loaded Once More
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Radiantrithym
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, gaining, 4path, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, took over turn, shook clear, lasted

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 21 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 21 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not C onsidered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FABRICATE was a forward factor from the start, surged up the rail to make the lead nearing the turn, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch under right handed urging to win as much the best. CHAI TEA pressed the pace three wide and finished second best in the four path. TWILIGHT VISION away alertly, set the early pace in the two path, kept on but was outfinished. MISS BETTY hesitated at the start giving up several lengths and passed tiring rivals. ROSE KNOWS had good early speed then faded. SKY had speed into the turn then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Knows
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Fabricate
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, slipped through 7/16pole, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set early pace 2w, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Chai Tea
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, second best, 4path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CITY OF CLOUDS stalked the pace into the stretch, closed willingly in the three path under right handed urging to make the lead inside the sixteenth pole and drew clear. MORE LOVE sped to the lead soon after the start, set a rapid pace until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. AURA OF GOLD chased the pace into the stretch and faded in the four path. TOYI failed to menace. NAPA DUDE stumbled at the start and was no factor. SOPHIA'S PRINCE had brief speed. FEVER DREAM was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Fever Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Toyi
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: More Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set fast pace, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: City of Clouds
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, closed willingly 3path, right urging, late lead, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sophia's Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Napa Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Aura of Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, faded lane 4path
